	if (source.incident_state == "Resolved" )

	return "";
})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_datad_datadog_incidents_itsm_table</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-27 18:00:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>f28cce0893d10210864074dcebba10b6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_f28cce0893d10210864074dcebba10b6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-27 18:00:29</sys_updated_on><target_field>close_notes</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_6d5c3963db472200c1e6771ebf9619bc
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Monitors ITSM Transform Map">daf0a5cddb872200c1e6771ebf96198c</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {

    var int_severity = 4;

	if (source.priority == 'normal')
		int_severity = 1;
	else if (source.priority == 'all')
		int_severity = 2;
	else if (source.priority == 'low')
		int_severity = 3;

	return int_severity; // return the value to be put into the target field

})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_datad_datadog_incident_table</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-11-18 19:01:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>6d5c3963db472200c1e6771ebf9619bc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_6d5c3963db472200c1e6771ebf9619bc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-12-19 02:52:49</sys_updated_on><target_field>priority</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_85add1addbf32200c1e6771ebf9619ac
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Monitors ITSM Transform Map">daf0a5cddb872200c1e6771ebf96198c</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
  /**
  *  This is an example of a regex search on a monitor entry.
  *  If you have urgency defined in the text of your alert, then you can search for it with a regex.
  *  assume the alert text would look something like this:
  *
  *  Oh no, something bad happened
  *  Urgency: 3
  *  Too many bad things happened!
  *
  **/

  var urgency = "";
  var re = /Urgency:\s([0-9])/g;
  var m = re.exec(source.text_only_msg);
  // If there is no match, m will be null;
  if (m) {
    if (m.length == 2) {
      urgency = m[1];
    }
  }
	return urgency; // return the value to be put into the target field

})(source);
]]></source_script><source_table>x_datad_datadog_incident_table</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-12-19 18:49:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>85add1addbf32200c1e6771ebf9619ac</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_85add1addbf32200c1e6771ebf9619ac</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-12-19 20:10:58</sys_updated_on><target_field>urgency</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

	}

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_b186bf5a93494210864074dcebba1098
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Cases ITSM Transform Map">2654789547db7110064b4e0f016d43c7</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
	if (source.incident_state === "Resolved" )
		return "Incident Resolved by Datadog";
	if (source.incident_state === "Closed")
		return "Incident Closed by Datadog";
	return "";
})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_datad_datadog_case_incident_table</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-22 15:14:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>b186bf5a93494210864074dcebba1098</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_b186bf5a93494210864074dcebba1098</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-22 17:01:56</sys_updated_on><target_field>close_notes</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_17be0a42974102107d1ff93de053afcf
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_datad_datadog.DatadogAjax</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Server-side script for reading & writing Datadog ITOM/ITSM properties.</description><name>DatadogAjax</name><script><![CDATA[var DatadogAjax = Class.create();
DatadogAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	/**
	 * Loads all of the Datadog sys properties
	 */
	getConfigSettings: function () {
		var sysProperties = new GlideRecordSecure('sys_properties');
		sysProperties.addQuery('sys_package.name', 'ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog');
		sysProperties.query();

		var objs = new Array();
		while (sysProperties.next()) {
			var prop = toProperty(sysProperties);
			objs.push(prop);

			if (prop.type === "password2") {
				var isSetProp = {};
				isSetProp.name = "_" + prop.name.split(".")[1] + "Set";
				isSetProp.type = "true | false";
				isSetProp.value = prop.value && (prop.value.trim().length > 0);
				objs.push(isSetProp);
			}
		}

		return JSON.stringify(objs);
	},
	/**
	 * Updates the Datadog sys property values
	 */
	saveConfigSettigs: function () {
		var result = {};
		var props = ["datacenter", "apiKey", "applicationKey", "syncEnabled"];
		var updatedProps = [];
		try {
			for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) {
				var val = this.getParameter("sysparam_" + props[i]);
				if (val) {
					gs.setProperty("x_datad_datadog." + props[i], val);
					updatedProps.push(props[i]);
				}
			}
			result.success = true;
			gs.info("Updated properties: {0}", updatedProps.join(", "));
		} catch (error) {
			gs.error("Datadog: Failed to save config settings: {0}", error);
			result.success = false;
		}

		return JSON.stringify(result);
	},
	type: 'DatadogAjax'
});

function toProperty(record) {
	var property = {};
	property["name"] = record["name"].getDisplayValue();
	property["type"] = record["type"].getDisplayValue();
	if (record["type"].getDisplayValue() === "true | false") {
		property["value"] = record["value"].getDisplayValue() === "true";
	} else {
		property["value"] = record["value"].getDisplayValue();
	}

	return property;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-21 13:02:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>17be0a42974102107d1ff93de053afcf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DatadogAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy>protected</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_17be0a42974102107d1ff93de053afcf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-21 13:02:38</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_datad_datadog_case_event_table</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Set apiUserID Case Event</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    try {
        var ddApiUserID = gs.getProperty("x_datad_datadog.apiUserID");
        var userIDIncoming = current.sys_created_by;
        if (userIDIncoming !== ddApiUserID) {
			gs.setProperty("x_datad_datadog.apiUserID", userIDIncoming);
        }
    } catch (ex) {
        gs.error("Error: " + ex);
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-21 13:38:57</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2f945e86974102107d1ff93de053afb3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set apiUserID Case Event</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_2f945e86974102107d1ff93de053afb3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-21 13:38:57</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2f945e86974102107d1ff93de053afb3"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>ignore</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Monitors ITOM Transform Map">37a065cddb872200c1e6771ebf9619ac</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
    if (source.monitor_priority)
		return ['Critical', 'Major', 'Minor', 'Warning', 'OK'][source.monitor_priority - 1];
})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_datad_datadog_event_table</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-11-16 16:27:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>b0b5cbf2db032200c1e6771ebf961987</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_b0b5cbf2db032200c1e6771ebf961987</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-11 20:23:21</sys_updated_on><target_field>severity</target_field><target_table>em_event</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Incidents ITSM Transform">2b9b0ec493d10210864074dcebba1061</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
	if (source.incident_state == "Resolved")
		return "Resolved by caller";
	if (source.incident_state == "Closed")
		return 1;
	return "";
})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_datad_datadog_incidents_itsm_table</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-27 17:58:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>fd2c020893d10210864074dcebba1070</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_fd2c020893d10210864074dcebba1070</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-27 17:58:52</sys_updated_on><target_field>close_code</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_page_a1540ec6970102107d1ff93de053af4c
sys_update_xml.payload: general Script Includes entry var ga = new GlideAjax('DatadogAjax'); // getConfigSettings is the name of the server-side function being invoked ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getConfigSettings'); ga.getXMLAnswer(function (answer) { var data = JSON.parse(answer); for (var i = 0; data && i < data.length; i++) { if (data[i]['name'].startsWith(SYS_PROP_PREFIX)) { var val = data[i].value; var field = data[i]['name'].substring(SYS_PROP_PREFIX.length); if (data[i]["type"] === "true | false") { document.getElementById(field).checked = val; } else if (FIELD_NAMES.includes(field) && data[i]["type"] !== "password2") { document.getElementById(field).value = val; } } else if (data[i]['name'].startsWith("_")) { document.getElementById(data[i]['name'].substring(1)).value = data[i].value; if (!data[i].value) { var elem = document.getElementById(data[i]['name'].substring(1, data[i]['name'].length - 3)); elem.value = ""; elem.placeholder = "Enter Value"; } } } deactivateSaveIfInvalid(); }); var saveBtn = document.getElementById("save-btn"); saveBtn.addEventListener('click', function (event) { event.preventDefault(); var invalidFields = validate(); if (invalidFields.length > 0) { var errorMessage = 'The following mandatory field(s) are not filled in: ' + invalidFields.join(", "); flashMessage(errorMessage, 'error'); return; } document.getElementById("save-btn").disabled = true; hideStatusBox(); if (timeoutId) { clearTimeout(timeoutId); timeoutId = null; } onSave(); }); for (var i = 0; i < FIELD_NAMES.length; i++) { document.getElementById(FIELD_NAMES[i]).addEventListener('change', deactivateSaveIfInvalid); } } function onSave() { var ga = new GlideAjax('DatadogAjax'); ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'saveConfigSettigs'); for (var i = 0; i < FIELD_NAMES.length; i++) { var field = FIELD_NAMES[i]; var elem = document.getElementById(field); if (elem instanceof HTMLInputElement && elem.type === "checkbox") { ga.addParam('sysparam_' + field, (elem.checked) ? "true" : "false"); } else if (isPasswordElement(elem)) { if (elem.value && elem.value.trim().length > 0) { // avoids overwriting passwords with empty strings if no // new password value was entered ga.addParam('sysparam_' + field, elem.value); } } else { ga.addParam('sysparam_' + field, elem.value); } } ga.getXMLAnswer(function (answer) { var data = JSON.parse(answer); if (data.success) { flashMessage('Update Succeeded', 'info'); } else { flashMessage('Update Failed', 'error'); } document.getElementById("save-btn").disabled = false; }); } function validate() { var errorFields = []; for (var i = 0; i < REQUIRED_FIELD_NAMES.length; i++) { var elem = document.getElementById(FIELD_NAMES[i]); if (isPasswordElement(elem) && (!elem.value || elem.value.trim().length === 0)) { var fieldSet = document.getElementById(FIELD_NAMES[i] + "Set"); if (!fieldSet || fieldSet.value !== "true") { errorFields.push(FIELD_NAMES[i]); } } } return errorFields; } function deactivateSaveIfInvalid() { document.getElementById("save-btn").disabled = validate().length > 0; } function flashMessage(message, level) { var isError = level == "error"; var statusMsg = document.getElementById("status-msg"); statusMsg.textContent = message; statusMsg.parentElement.classList.remove((isError) ? 'notification-info' : 'notification-danger'); statusMsg.parentElement.classList.add((isError) ? 'notification-danger' : 'notification-info'); var statusBox = document.getElementById("status-box"); fadeInElement(statusBox); timeoutId = window.setTimeout(function () { fadeOutElement(statusBox); }, 5000); } function isPasswordElement(elem) { return (elem instanceof HTMLInputElement && elem.type === "password"); } function fadeInElement(elem) { elem.classList.remove('conceal'); elem.classList.add('reveal'); elem.classList.add('fast-transition'); } function fadeOutElement(elem) { elem.classList.remove('fast-transition'); elem.classList.remove('reveal'); elem.classList.add('conceal'); } function hideStatusBox() { var elem = document.getElementById("status-box"); elem.classList.add('conceal'); elem.classList.add('fast-transition'); } ]]>Configuration settings for the Datadog ITOM/ITSM applicationfalsex_datad_datadog_Datadog Configuration.do

    try {
        var ddApiUserID = gs.getProperty("x_datad_datadog.apiUserID");
        var userIDIncoming = current.sys_created_by;
        if (userIDIncoming !== ddApiUserID) {
			gs.setProperty("x_datad_datadog.apiUserID", userIDIncoming);
        }
    } catch (ex) {
        gs.error("Error: " + ex);
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-21 13:40:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>19479646974102107d1ff93de053af77</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set apiUserID Case Incident</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_19479646974102107d1ff93de053af77</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-21 13:40:38</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=19479646974102107d1ff93de053af77"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_2743b9452fbb3010f75ef7ecf699b6f1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Monitors ITSM Transform Map">daf0a5cddb872200c1e6771ebf96198c</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
  /**
  *  This is an example of a regex search on a monitor entry.
  *  If you have impact defined in the text of your alert, then you can search for it with a regex.
  *  assume the alert text would look something like this:
  *
  *  Oh no, something bad happened
  *  Impact: 3
  *  Too many bad things happened!
  *
  **/

  var impact = "";
  var re = /Impact:\s([0-9])/g;
  var m = re.exec(source.text_only_msg);
  // If there is no match, m will be null;
  if (m) {
    if (m.length == 2) {
      impact = m[1];
    }
  }
	return impact; // return the value to be put into the target field

})(source);

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_06c29a42974102107d1ff93de053afe1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_datad_datadog.PublishChangeEvent</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Server-side script for publishing changes from the Incident table to Datadog</description><name>PublishChangeEvent</name><script><![CDATA[var PublishChangeEvent = Class.create();
PublishChangeEvent.prototype = {
    initialize: function(changedFieldName) {
		this.isSyncEnabled = gs.getProperty("x_datad_datadog.syncEnabled") === "true";
		this.apiUserID = gs.getProperty("x_datad_datadog.apiUserID");
		this.datacenter = gs.getProperty("x_datad_datadog.datacenter");
		this.apiKey =  gs.getProperty("x_datad_datadog.apiKey");
		this.applicationKey =  gs.getProperty("x_datad_datadog.applicationKey");
		this.changedFieldName = changedFieldName;
    },
	isConfigured: function() {
		isSet = function(val) {
			return val && val.trim().length > 0;
		};
		return isSet(this.datacenter) && isSet(this.apiKey) && isSet(this.applicationKey);
	},
	execute: function(current) {
		if (!this.isConfigured()) {
			gs.info("Not publishing update because the integration has not been properly configured");
			return;
		} else if (!this.isSyncEnabled) {
			gs.info("Not publishing update because syncing is not enabled");
			return;
		} else if (current.getValue('sys_updated_by') === gs.getProperty("x_datad_datadog.apiUserID")) {
			gs.info("Not publishing update because it was triggered by the Datadog API user");
			return;
		} else if (current.getValue('sys_created_by') !== gs.getProperty("x_datad_datadog.apiUserID")) {
			gs.info("Not publishing update because incident not created by Datadog");
			return;
		}
		
		try {
			var req = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
			req.setEndpoint(getDatadogURL(this.datacenter));
			req.setHttpMethod("POST");
			
			var updatedOn = GlideDateTime(current.getValue('sys_updated_on'));
			var tzOffset = updatedOn.getTZOffset();
			var dateFmt = detectDateFormat();
			
			var body = JSON.stringify({
				"data": {
					"type": "incident",
					"id": current.sys_id.getDisplayValue(),
					"attributes": createStateObject(current, dateFmt, tzOffset),
				},
				"meta": {
					"instance_name": gs.getProperty("instance_name"),
					"changed_field_name": this.changedFieldName,
					"updated_time": toISOString(toUTC(updatedOn, tzOffset)),
					"updated_by": lookupUserById(current.getValue('sys_updated_by'))
				}
			});
			req.setRequestBody(body);
			req.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
			req.setRequestHeader("DD-API-KEY", this.apiKey);
			req.setRequestHeader("DD-APPLICATION-KEY", this.applicationKey);
			var resp = req.execute();
			if (resp.getStatusCode() >= 200 && resp.getStatusCode() < 300) {
                gs.info("Successfully sync'd update with Datadog: {0} ({1})", resp.getBody(), resp.getStatusCode());
			} else {
				gs.error("Failed to sync update with Datadog: {0} ({1})", resp.getBody(), resp.getStatusCode());
			}
		} catch (e) {
			gs.error("Failed to sync update with Datadog: {0}", e);
		}
	},
    type: 'PublishChangeEvent'
};

function createStateObject(incidentState, dateFmt, tzOffset) {
    var obj = {};
	if (!incidentState) {
		return obj;
	}

    obj.number = incidentState.number.getDisplayValue();  
    obj.state = incidentState.state.getDisplayValue();
    obj.impact = incidentState.impact.getDisplayValue();
    obj.urgency = incidentState.urgency.getDisplayValue();
    obj.priority = incidentState.priority.getDisplayValue();
    obj.correlation_id = incidentState.correlation_id.getDisplayValue();
	
	var jsonWorkNote = incidentState.work_notes.getJournalEntry(1);
	var jsonComment = incidentState.comments.getJournalEntry(1);

	obj.work_notes = buildMessageJson(jsonWorkNote, dateFmt, tzOffset);
	obj.comments = buildMessageJson(jsonComment, dateFmt, tzOffset);
	
    return obj;
}

function buildMessageJson(messageObj, dateFmt, tzOffset) {
	// messageObj in the form:
	// "2024-06-26 19:18:53 - Real Name (Additional comments)
	// This is a comment"

	var messages = [];
	var msg = {};
	if(!messageObj) {
		gs.info("messageObj empty");
		return messages;
	}
	// gs.info("=======================");
	// gs.info(messageObj);
	// gs.info("=======messageObj=========");

	var authorAndTime = messageObj.substring(0, messageObj.indexOf('\n'));
	var commentOrWorkNote = messageObj.substring(messageObj.indexOf('\n') + 1);
	// gs.info("+++++++++++++++++++++");
	// gs.info(authorAndTime);
	// gs.info(commentOrWorkNote);
	// gs.info("+++++++key+++++++++");
	// authorAndTime: "2024-06-26 19:18:53 - Real Name (Additional comments)"
	// commentOrWorkNote: "This is a comment"
	if (authorAndTime) {
		var tokens = authorAndTime.split(' - ');
		//tokens: ["2024-06-26 19:18:53", "Real Name (Additional comments)"]
		msg.timestamp = toISOString(toUTC(parseTime(tokens[0].trim(), dateFmt), tzOffset));
		// msg.timestamp: 2024-06-26T19:18:53Z
		msg.author = tokens[1].replace(/\(.+\)$/, "").trim();
		// msg.author: "Real Name"
		msg.message = commentOrWorkNote;
		// msg.message: "This is a comment"
		messages.push(msg);
	}
  
    return messages; 
}

function detectDateFormat() {
	var dateSeparators = /([-./])/;
	// use a reference date/time not near a month/day/year boundary to ensure that adding 2 days will only change the day component
	var gdtNow = new GlideDateTime("2024-01-15 12:00:00");
	var gdtNowTokens = gdtNow.getDisplayValue().split(" ")[0].split(dateSeparators);
	
	var yearIdx = -1;
	for (var i = 0; i < gdtNowTokens.length; i++) {
		if (gdtNowTokens[i] === gdtNow.getYearLocalTime().toString()) {
			yearIdx = i;
			break;
		}
	}
	
	gdtNow.addDaysUTC(2);
	var gdtNextTokens = gdtNow.getDisplayValue().split(" ")[0].split(dateSeparators);
	var dayIdx = -1;
	for (i = 0; i < gdtNowTokens.length; i++) {
		if (gdtNowTokens[i] !== gdtNextTokens[i]) {
			dayIdx = i;
			break;
		}
	}
	
	if (yearIdx === -1 || dayIdx === -1) {
		// give up and return the default format if unable to parse current format
		gs.warn("Unable to parse date/time format (" +  gdtNow.getDisplayValue() + "), assuming system default");
		return "yyyy-MM-dd";
	}
	
	var fmt = "";
	for (i = 0; i < gdtNowTokens.length; i++) {
		if (dateSeparators.exec(gdtNowTokens[i])) {
			fmt += gdtNowTokens[i];
		} else if (i === yearIdx) {
			fmt += "yyyy";
		} else if (i === dayIdx) {
			fmt += "dd";
		} else {
			fmt += "MM";
		}
	}
	
	return fmt;
}

function parseTime(timeStr, dateFmt) {
	var gdt = new GlideDateTime();
	// assumes that the time portion is always formatted as HH:mm:ss
	gdt.setDisplayValue(timeStr, dateFmt + " HH:mm:ss");
	
	return gdt;
}

function toUTC(gdt, tzOffsetMs) {
	var utcTime = GlideDateTime(gdt);
	if (tzOffsetMs < 0) {
		utcTime.add(Math.abs(tzOffsetMs));
	} else {
		utcTime.subtract(tzOffsetMs);
	}
	
	return utcTime;
}

function toISOString(gdt) {
	var dateTime = gdt.getDisplayValueInternal().split(" ");
	return dateTime[0] + "T" + dateTime[1] + "Z";
}

function lookupUserById(userId) {
	var sysUser = new GlideRecordSecure('sys_user');
	sysUser.addQuery('user_name', userId);
	sysUser.query();
	
	var name = userId;
	if (sysUser.next()) {
		name = sysUser.name.toString().trim();
	} else {
		gs.error("User name not found for user: userId={0}", userId);
	}
	
	return name;
}

function getDatadogURL(datacenter) {
	var dcs = { 
		"US1": "https://app.datadoghq.com", 
		"US3": "https://us3.datadoghq.com",
		"US5": "https://us5.datadoghq.com",
		"EU1": "https://app.datadoghq.eu",
		"AP1": "https://ap1.datadoghq.com"
	};
	// default to us1 given an unknown datacenter & no x_datad_datadog.datadogURL property 
	prefix = gs.getProperty("x_datad_datadog.datadogURL") || dcs[datacenter.toUpperCase()] || dcs["US1"];
	
	return prefix + "/api/v2/integration/servicenow/webhook";
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-21 13:20:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>06c29a42974102107d1ff93de053afe1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>29</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PublishChangeEvent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy>protected</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_06c29a42974102107d1ff93de053afe1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>john_tiglias_admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-27 19:44:44</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
